title: Ng Alain CURD Component Options Schema

path.description: The path to create the component.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component:

inlineStyle.description: Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

flat.description: Flag to indicate if a directory is created.

skipImport.description: Flag to skip the module import.

selector.description: The selector to use for the component.

export.description: Specifies if declaring module exports the component.

entryComponent.description: Specifies if the component is an entry component of declaring module.

lintFix.description: Specifies whether to apply lint fixes after generating the component.

withoutPrefix.description: 组件名不加前缀 (Without prefix to selectors)

module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

target.description: 指定目标路径，支持 `bus/list` 写法 (Specifies relative path, could be set like `bus/list`.)
